Articles.Content:
Hello everybody, i know this game from indie games website, i love this game because of the spore-like spaceship building, i got like 34000 high thanks to the ''f'' key

Well i was seeing discovery planet and they said something about photon reactors, and i whought i could say it here as this is really space game, a real one, the only bad thing is that it has no objectives, i got a brother so we found one, who can get higher?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
